author: RTÉ News
title: Councils act to ensure people stay home for Easter
description: A number of councils around the country are closing public areas and access routes to them ahead of the bank holiday weekend as part of efforts to curb the spread of coronavirus.
content:
A number of councils around the country are closing public areas and access routes to them ahead of the bank holiday weekend as part of efforts to curb the spread of coronavirus.
They say the moves are being made following consultation with An Garda Síochána… [+3955 chars]
